The demo is accesible at

(outdated demo)
and now also at
http://bne.linkeddata.es/
now located in linkeddata4 (Outdated, will be removed)
The code is located at /var/www/bne-demo
It consists of
2 php scripts: ARC2_JITSerializerPlugin.php and jitendpoint.php
Several js, html and css files being the most important the following: jitendpoint.js and index.html
The library ARC2 which is located at /home/dvila/arc/
